tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
    player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    country VARCHAR(50),
    date_joined TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE game_progress (
    progress_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
    level INT,
    score INT,
    last_played TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE game_progress (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    level INT,
    score INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_player_id FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  email VARCHAR(100),
  registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE game_progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
  level INT,
  score INT,
  progress_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE achievements (
  achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
  achievement_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  achievement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE items_inventory (
  item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
  item_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  quantity INT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE players (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
    date_of_birth DATE,
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE player_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    level INT,
    score INT,
    last_played TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE achievements (
    achievement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    achievement_name VARCHAR(100),
    achievement_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES games(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_inventory (
    item_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id INT,
    item_name VARCHAR(100),
    quantity INT,
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES players(player_id)
);
